cab.content: -/"/it from Viceroy, Foreign Department, 20th May 1919. (Received 7 a.m., 21st.)Clear the line.Secret. Afghanistan. We suggest that Aga Khan should he asked to issue a proclamation enjoining loyalty and service to Government upon all his followers.There are large numbers of Maulai in Uliitral and Gilgit neighbourhood and a good many in Peshawar and Kabul.
